line.comment: * Setup new plugin data structure and init it
* Init and reinit are run every time the game loads
* Just set interval to 1 minute, decent frequency for this test plugin
* Use this area to process special instructions when the plugin is toggled on
* Use this area to process special instructions when the plugin is toggled off
* The event script is called every interval
* Probability of using the Action Button (and associated script)
* Probability of publishing article for all sectors
* Probability of publishing article in the player's current sector
* Probability of article being displayed once, then expiring
* Number of minutes until article expires
* Action script to run when button pressed
* Headline text to display above action button
* Set Race array - valid races to publish news for

plugin event

Plugin enabled flag
Init and reinit are run every time the game loads
Just set interval to 1 minute, decent frequency for this test plugin
Use this area to process special instructions when the plugin is toggled on
set global variable: name='GNS.DNGenerator.PageID' value=$PageID
Use this area to process special instructions when the plugin is toggled off
The event script is called every interval
Probability of using the Action Button (and associated script)
Probability of publishing article for all sectors
Probability of publishing article in the player's current sector
Probability of article being displayed once, then expiring
